name: GPT-4.1
hint: Best quality for reasoning & writing; slower/costlier.

name: GPT-4o
hint: Great all-rounder: strong quality + fast; best default.

name: GPT-4o Mini
hint: Fast & cheap for everyday tasks; weaker deep reasoning.

name: GPT-3.5 Turbo
hint: Legacy budget model; use only if you need lowest cost.

name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
hint: Highest quality; best for complex reasoning & long outputs.

name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
hint: Very fast with strong quality; great for interactive editing & summaries.

name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite
hint: Ultra fast & low cost; good for short edits and quick Q&A.

name: Gemini 2.0 Flash
hint: Fast general-purpose model; good default when speed matters.

name: Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite
hint: Cheapest/fastest option; best for simple tasks and drafts.
